Project Overview:

We are an Australian public accounting firm developing an end-to-end financial reporting and tax return automation software. Our current focus is building a prototype for automating the reconciliation of GST/VAT accounts
column2: a process that is time-consuming and commonly required by accountants.

column1: We have already outlined the full reconciliation process and gathered sample data that the system will need to work with. This project will serve as the foundation for expanding automation into other accounting areas.

Implement both rule-based logic and integrate simple AI components where necessary (e.g.
column2: handling exceptions or identifying reconciliation anomalies).

column3: and well-documented code for easy future enhancements.

Data Ingestion:
Import GST-related data from sources like Excel
Handle general ledger transactions
Reconciliation Logic:
Match GST account balances with outstanding GST liabilities from BAS.
Identify retrospective adjustments and incorrect BAS payment allocations.
Reconcile GST paid and GST collected
Exception Handling:
Flag discrepancies and provide error messages or reconciliation notes.
Handle manual adjustments and incomplete data intelligently.
Output:
Generate a clear reconciliation report highlighting matched items

Proficient in Python

Experience working with Excel/CSV data (using libraries like OpenPyXL

Ability to write clean

Knowledge of Australian GST rules and BAS reporting.

Experience with SQL databases for storing financial data (optional).

Documentation outlining the code structure
column3: and how to run the system.
